org.protest.integration.lib.textutils
Class EditorUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.protest.integration.lib.textutils.EditorUtils

public class EditorUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class, which contain functions, for basic text manipulation in the editor plane.

Compass the current selection with the given macro and parameters

Parameters:
name - macro name
title - input dialog box title
originalOrdinalNumber - the original selection place between the parameters
parameters - macro parameters
Returns:
Throws:
NullInputException - if the user press cancel in the input dialog

compassWith

public static InsertionStringPair compassWith(java.lang.String name,
                                              java.lang.String title,
                                              java.lang.String... parameters)
                                       throws NullInputException
Compass the current selection with the given macro or function name and parameters. The original selection will be the last parameter in the macro.

Parameters:
name - macro name
title - input dialog title
parameters - macro parameters
Returns:
Throws:
NullInputException - if the user press cancel in the input dialog
